name: 6 Piece MAPEX kit
description: The set includes: Snare, Bass (with double bass pedal-brand name Tama), four toms, ride cymbal, hi-hats, two crash symbols and a throne (Tama), heads/skins are Evans-brand and quite new. Kit is red. The set includes all stand hardware and is in great condition. When we bought it new it was $1700-2000 worth of equip. We are asking $675 We are running our of room in our house and they are rarely played. THEY GET TO HAVE A GOOD HOME!
